verses.roman:
bhakta-bhakti-kṛṣṇaprema-tattvera nidhāra
vaiṣṇavera kṛtya, āra vaiṣṇava-ācāra

synonyms: bhakta—devotee; bhakti—devotional service; kṛṣṇa-prema—love of Kṛṣṇa; tattvera—of the truth of; nidhāra—ascertainment; vaiṣṇavera kṛtya—duties of a Vaiṣṇava; āra—and; vaiṣṇava-ācāra—characteristics of a Vaiṣṇava.
translation: "You shall have to ascertain the basic principles of a devotee, devotional service, love of Godhead, Vaiṣṇava duties, and Vaiṣṇava characteristics.
